cab.content: i This Document is the Property ol / -His Britannic .iY;aiesty's Government.)19SECRET.BATTLE SITUATION * NOON - 5th MAY, 1918.1. The night passed relatively quietly, and no attacks have developed bo far this morning.2* The enemy attempted to recapture the ORCHARD atFESTUBERT. It is "believed his attempt was not successful^5.Minor operations which enabled us to improve our line, and. to capture a few prisoners were carried out by us in the neighbourhood of HEBUTISRNE and SAILLY-LE-SEC'.General Staff,War Office, S.W*1. 5th May, 1918.Issued at 12*10 p.m.
